text_block_list.text:
"Champions Meeting"...?!
Suzuka-san, what exactly is this all about?
text_block_list.name: Special Week
Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It appears to be a new style of competition. It's a race where you compete against opponents matched in real-time, to decide victory or defeat...

This means we can race against Umamusume from all over the country.
...I'm looking forward to running.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Since you can only register up to three Umamusume for the competition, you first need to be selected for that, you know.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Also, the competition is split into Preliminaries and Finals, I see!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: We have to win through the preliminaries and aim for advancement to the finals!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: Alright! Let's give it our best! Shall we start training together right away, Suzuka-san?
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: Fufufu... Very well, let's head out.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
